content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Coal, and my inventory now reflects this addition. 
# With Coal back in my inventory, I can now proceed to refuel the Stone Furnace to continue smelting the Iron Ore.

# I will insert a sufficient amount of Coal into the Stone Furnace to ensure it can operate effectively.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 units of Coal into the furnace.

# After inserting the Coal, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace to confirm that it is now operational.
furnace_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Check the current status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Current status of the Stone Furnace after adding Coal: {furnace_status}")  # Display the status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
